plugins.name: get-antd-token
plugins.description:
# get-antd-token - Ant Design Token 匹配工具


## 简介


get-antd-token 是一个专为设计师和开发者打造的 Figma 插件，帮助您快速匹配 Figma 设计元素与 Ant Design 的设计 Token，实现无缝的设计与开发协作。


## 主要功能


- 🎨 **精准颜色匹配**：选择任意元素，即时获取对应的 Ant Design 颜色 Token

- 💧 **半透明颜色识别**：智能识别半透明颜色，并提供 `rgba(token.colorXXX, 0.x)` 格式的替代方案

- 🔍 **边框与内边距识别**：自动检测元素的圆角和内边距，匹配相应的 borderRadius 和 padding Token

- 📝 **模板管理系统**：支持导入/导出 Token 模板，完全兼容 Ant Design 的主题配置文件

- 🔄 **一键复制**：快速复制 Token 值，轻松粘贴到代码中


## 插件优势


- **提高设计开发效率**：不再需要手动查找颜色代码或测量边距

- **保持设计一致性**：确保使用 Ant Design 官方推荐的 Token

- **简化设计交接**：设计师可以直接提供 Token 名称而非色值

- **支持主题切换**：通过模板管理轻松在不同主题间切换
plugins.tagline: 支持选中figma的元素获取到antd主题色对应的token值

126202.name: get-antd-token
126202.description:
# get-antd-token - Ant Design Token 匹配工具


## 简介


get-antd-token 是一个专为设计师和开发者打造的 Figma 插件，帮助您快速匹配 Figma 设计元素与 Ant Design 的设计 Token，实现无缝的设计与开发协作。


## 主要功能


- 🎨 **精准颜色匹配**：选择任意元素，即时获取对应的 Ant Design 颜色 Token

- 💧 **半透明颜色识别**：智能识别半透明颜色，并提供 `rgba(token.colorXXX, 0.x)` 格式的替代方案

- 🔍 **边框与内边距识别**：自动检测元素的圆角和内边距，匹配相应的 borderRadius 和 padding Token

- 📝 **模板管理系统**：支持导入/导出 Token 模板，完全兼容 Ant Design 的主题配置文件

- 🔄 **一键复制**：快速复制 Token 值，轻松粘贴到代码中


## 插件优势


- **提高设计开发效率**：不再需要手动查找颜色代码或测量边距

- **保持设计一致性**：确保使用 Ant Design 官方推荐的 Token

- **简化设计交接**：设计师可以直接提供 Token 名称而非色值

- **支持主题切换**：通过模板管理轻松在不同主题间切换
126202.release_notes: 新增的antd-token主题色模版的导出和导入功能
126202.tagline: 支持选中figma的元素获取到antd主题色对应的token值

plugins.name: Condens
plugins.description:
With the Condens plugin, you can quickly import highlights from Condens into FigJam. This keeps your insights intact, preserving key details like participant names and links back to the original data.


Perfect for brainstorming, organizing ideas, and running synthesis workshops with your team — without losing the context behind your research, even when switching between tools.


How it works:

  1. Export your highlights from Condens as a CSV file.
  2. Open the Condens plugin in FigJam and upload the CSV file.
  3. Your Highlights are instantly converted into sticky notes, complete with the respondent’s name and a direct link back to the original data in Condens, ready to use in your FigJam board.


Contact us for support, book a demo to get a personalized walkthrough, or visit our Help Center for more information.

If you're not using Condens yet, start your free 15-day trial at condens.io.
plugins.tagline: Import Highlights from Condens into Figjam

plugins.name: ScreenHub
plugins.description:
Introducing the ScreenHub Figma plugin 🧩


Easily way to access and import your collections directly into your design projects.


How it works:


1. Install the Screenhub plugin

2. Sign in or sign up to Screenhub

3. Organize your bookmarks into collections

4. Open the Screenhub plugin from any Figma file

5. Browse and preview your items

6. Click to insert items directly into your design


Questions / Ideas? Contact Us
plugins.tagline: From ScreenHub to Figma in One Click

plugins.name: Tazym
plugins.description:
Introducing Tazym, the ultimate Figma plugin that streamlines the design-to-web process. With Tazym, you can effortlessly upload your designs to the cloud, generating a unique URL that allows you to update your design in Figma in real-time. Say goodbye to manual website updates or the need to rely on developers. With Tazym, you are the creator, and you own your designs.


Getting started with Tazym is easy. Simply select your design, name it, choose a format (SVG, PNG, or JPG), and voila - you have a URL that can be used anywhere to showcase your work. When inspiration strikes and you want to make updates, it's as easy as editing in Figma and hitting the Update button in Tazym. Your users will see your latest creations instantly.


Ready to take control of your designs and streamline your workflow? Visit tazym.com to learn more and start using Tazym today!
plugins.tagline: Export your Figma designs to URLs. Edit them any time.

plugins.name: Smart Rename
plugins.description:
Smart Rename is a powerful Figma plugin built to streamline your workflow by letting you bulk rename frames customizable base names and smart suffixes like version numbers, dimensions, or sequence numbers.


It also fixes a common frustration in UI design: decimal positioning. When frames have non-integer X or Y values, exported assets often end up with unwanted white lines or blurry edges. Smart Rename solves this by auto-aligning frames to the nearest whole pixel, ensuring clean, sharp exports every time.


From organization to export-readiness, this plugin saves time and eliminates manual, error-prone tasks—all in a few clicks.
plugins.tagline: Bulk rename and align Figma frames in seconds. Add version, size, or number suffixes effortlessly.

plugins.name: Lighthouse
plugins.description:
Lighthouse helps designers check Lottie animation compatibility across iOS, Android, and Web. It scans Figma frames, detects unsupported features like shadows, blurs, etc., and lists issues directly on affected layers. Double-click to jump to problem layers and get instant updates as you fix them—ensuring a smooth animation workflow.


How to Use Lighthouse:

1️⃣ Select a Frame – Open Lighthouse and choose a frame to analyze.

2️⃣ Instant Issue Detection – View a list of unsupported animation features.

3️⃣ Quick Fix Navigation – Double-click an issue to select the affected layer.

4️⃣ Live Updates – Changes update instantly as you fix issues.

5️⃣ Final Check & Export – Ensure compatibility for seamless Lottie animations.

6️⃣ Mark frames – Mark frames that are ready for animation to avoid confusion and ensure efficient workflow.


Simplify your motion design process with Lighthouse! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Instantly detect unsupported Lottie features in Figma for seamless cross-platform animations.

plugins.name: Icon Pro
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma workflow with Icon Pro

The perfect tool for searching, customizing, and adding beautiful icons with ease. Effortlessly drag and drop icons onto your canvas, adjust stroke widths to match your design style, and fine-tune colors for the perfect look. Whether you're working on UI designs, prototypes, or wireframes, Icon Pro makes icon customization seamless and intuitive.


Key Features:

🔍 Searchr: Find the perfect icon in seconds.

🎨 Customizable Styles: Adjust stroke width and colors to fit any design.

🚀 Drag & Drop Simplicity: Add icons directly to your canvas with a single drag.

🌈 Beautiful Icons: A collection of high-quality icons to elevate your designs.
plugins.tagline: The Ultimate Drag & Drop Icon Plugin

plugins.name: Consistify
plugins.description:
With the Consistify plugin, you can be be able to:


Detect Design Inconsistencies: Scan multiple frames for discrepancies in font styles, colors, buttons, iconography(coming soon), spacing, and navigation elements(coming soon) etc.


Get Visual Feedback: Receive clear, color-coded tags indicating inconsistencies, with direct frame references and numerical comparisons for easy analysis.


Streamline Workflow(coming soon): Highlight design issues directly in the UI, allowing users to click and focus on problematic frames, helping maintain design system integrity across projects.


To use the Consistify plugin, follow these steps:


Open your design in Figma.

Select at least 2 frames you want to compare for inconsistencies.

Run the Plugin


Advanced Features(coming son:


Accessibility Checker: Analyze contrast ratios in real-time for WCAG compliance.

Component Management: Identify duplicate components and track usage statistics.


Design System Health Monitoring: Flag inconsistent color usage, manual overrides on text styles, and mismatched font sizes.


The plugin is a must-have tool for ensuring cohesive, well-structured designs while saving time on manual checks.

accepted.name: Nyekachi Wihioka
accepted.description: Product Designer passionate about creating seamless, user-centered experiences. Building tools that empower designers to work smarter and faster.

plugins.tagline: Streamline design workflows by detecting inconsistencies and ensuring design system integrity.

plugins.name: Image Mono Palette
plugins.description: Image Palette is a Figma plugin designed to help you create seamless color schemes. Upload an image, and the plugin extracts its primary color to generate a customizable monochromatic color palette. Perfect for UI/UX designers, branding professionals, and creative projects, this tool simplifies the process of creating harmonious designs by providing tokens and placing the palette directly on your canvas. It's fast, intuitive, and tailored for creativity.

plugins.name: Figma variables helper
plugins.description:
Check the variables present in all the nodes of your document.


  1. If a property is in a state that can have a variable but doesn’t have one, it generates a warning.
  2. If a property has a variable that doesn’t exist in any of the accessible libraries, it generates an error.
plugins.tagline: A Figma plugin to help manage variables.

120159.name: Figma variables helper
120159.description:
Check the variables present in all the nodes of your document.


  1. If a property is in a state that can have a variable but doesn’t have one, it generates a warning.
  2. If a property has a variable that doesn’t exist in any of the accessible libraries, it generates an error.
120159.tagline: A Figma plugin to help manage variables.

plugins.name: EasyMemo
plugins.description:
EasyMemo is a versatile plugin for creating, editing, and managing text memos within Figma. With EasyMemo, you can easily add colorful sticky notes, shapes with text, and simple text nodes to your canvas, helping to keep your workspace organized.


Key Features:


Memo Creation and Editing: Simply enter your text, select your desired memo type, and create memos effortlessly. You can edit memos directly on the canvas, and updates are reflected in real-time.

Customizable Colors: Choose colors from a preset color palette, allowing you to categorize and prioritize memos. The text color automatically adjusts for optimal readability based on the selected background color.

Easy Management:


Organize Memos in a List: Add memos to a list for better organization. You can update or delete memo texts directly from the list. The list is scrollable and always up-to-date.

Batch Generation: Easily generate all listed memos at once. Just click the "Create Shapes" button, and all memos will be neatly arranged on the canvas.

Efficient Layout: Memos are generated in the center of the viewport, focusing on the most relevant areas. They are neatly arranged to avoid overlap.

User-Friendly Interface: The modern and intuitive design features a clearly laid-out text input area, radio buttons for selecting memo types, a color palette, and a dynamically updating list.

How to Use:


Enter Text: Input your memo content in the text input area.

Select Memo Type: Choose from shapes with text, simple text, or sticky notes using the radio buttons.

Pick a Color: Select a color from the palette to categorize your memos. The selected color applies to the memo background, and the text color adjusts automatically.

Add to List: Press the Enter key to add the memo to the list. You can edit or delete memos directly within the list.

Generate Memos: Click the "Create Shapes" button to generate all memos on the canvas at once. Memos are centered in the viewport and neatly arranged.

EasyMemo is the perfect tool for organizing ideas and feedback within your Figma projects. Whether brainstorming, planning, or collaborating, EasyMemo simplifies memo management and supports you efficiently.
plugins.tagline: メモやテキストをEnterキー押下のみでリスト化して一括でShape,テキスト、Stickyを生成するプラグインです

plugins.name: Selemander Edit
plugins.description:
This plug-in provides useful functions such as reordering multi-selected items, enlarging and shrinking selections, automatically selecting items by name, deleting, and flipping the order.

이 플러그인은 선택한 여러 항목의 순서 변경, 선택 확대 및 축소, 이름을 통한 항목 자동 선택, 삭제, 순서 뒤집기 등 유용한 기능을 제공합니다.


### Short cut (If the plug-in window is enabled) ###

### 단축키 (플러그인 포커스 상태에서 동작) ###

  1. [Shift + Enter]: Enter the entered text into the selected text items. / 입력된 텍스트로 선택된 텍스트 항목에 입력
  2. [.] : Select the next item / 다음 항목 선택
  3. [,] : Select previous item / 이전 항목 선택
  4. [Shift + .]: Expand your selection to the previous item / 이전 항목을 선택에 추가합니다.
  5. [Shift + ,]: Expand your selection to the next item / 다음 항목을 선택에 추가합니다.
  6. [Left Arrow ←] : Move the selected items to the left / 선택된 항목들을 이전으로 이동
  7. [Right Arrow →] : Move the selected items to the right / 선택된 항목들을 다음으로 이동
  8. [Home] : Move to First / 첫번째 항목 선택
  9. [End] : Move to Last / 마지막 항목 선택
  10. [Delete, Backspace] : Delete selected items / 선택 항목들 삭제
  11. [Shift + s] : Swap between two texts / 선택된 두 텍스트 항목의 내용 바꾸기
  12. [Shift + r] : Reverse the selected items / 선택 항목의 순서를 뒤집기
  13. [-] : Unselect the last of the selections / 선택 항목들 중 마지막 항목을 선택 제거
  14. [Shift + -] : Unselect the first of the selections / 선택 항목들 중 첫번째 항목을 선택 제거
  15. [Shift + 1] : Select odd number items / 홀수 항목을 선택
  16. [Shift + 2] : Select even number items / 짝수 항목을 선택
plugins.tagline: Multi Selection & text controler for autolayout

### Short cut (If the plug-in window is enabled) ###

### 단축키 (플러그인 포커스 상태에서 동작) ###

  1. [Shift + Enter]: Enter the entered text into the selected text items. / 입력된 텍스트로 선택된 텍스트 항목에 입력
  2. [.] : Select the next item / 다음 항목 선택
  3. [,] : Select previous item / 이전 항목 선택
  4. [Shift + .]: Expand your selection to the previous item / 이전 항목을 선택에 추가합니다.
  5. [Shift + ,]: Expand your selection to the next item / 다음 항목을 선택에 추가합니다.
  6. [Left Arrow ←] : Move the selected items to the left / 선택된 항목들을 이전으로 이동
  7. [Right Arrow →] : Move the selected items to the right / 선택된 항목들을 다음으로 이동
  8. [Home] : Move to First / 첫번째 항목 선택
  9. [End] : Move to Last / 마지막 항목 선택
  10. [Delete, Backspace] : Delete selected items / 선택 항목들 삭제
  11. [Shift + s] : Swap between two texts / 선택된 두 텍스트 항목의 내용 바꾸기
  12. [Shift + r] : Reverse the selected items / 선택 항목의 순서를 뒤집기
  13. [-] : Unselect the last of the selections / 선택 항목들 중 마지막 항목을 선택 제거
  14. [Shift + -] : Unselect the first of the selections / 선택 항목들 중 첫번째 항목을 선택 제거
  15. [Shift + 1] : Select odd number items / 홀수 항목을 선택
  16. [Shift + 2] : Select even number items / 짝수 항목을 선택
123160.release_notes:
Eng.
- Fix a bug that scrolls through the screen when pressing the shortcut(Home, End) to go to the first and last items

Kor.
- 첫 항목 및 마지막 항목으로 이동하는 단축키(Home, End)를 누를 때 화면이 스크롤되는 버그 수정

plugins.name: strings_repository
plugins.description:
Simple plugin to synchronise translations with strings repository. Allows to push and pull translations from your own server. Works with active selection to speedup parsing processes.


Usage:

Enter connection details and press connect button.

After selection of element press "refresh selection" to get text labels from selection.

Press "pull" to fetch translations from remote server.

Press "apply" to apply translations from selected translations to document selection.

Press "push" to send translations to remote server.
plugins.tagline: Synchronize your translations

92001.name: strings_repository
92001.description:
Simple plugin to synchronise translations with strings repository. Allows to push and pull translations from your own server. Works with active selection to speedup parsing processes.


Usage:

Enter connection details and press connect button.

After selection of element press "refresh selection" to get text labels from selection.

Press "pull" to fetch translations from remote server.

Press "apply" to apply translations from selected translations to document selection.

Press "push" to send translations to remote server.
92001.release_notes: Add possibility to use HTML formatted text

plugins.name: FigJam Export to Markdown or JSON
plugins.description:
Turn sticky-note chaos into structured documentation.


This plugin reads your FigJam board, detects heading hierarchies by the number of ⭐ star stamps on each card, and exports a clean outline – perfect for journey-maps, service blueprints, research affinity walls or any workshop board that needs to become a report.


What you get

• Markdown or JSON with true heading levels (H1 / H2 / …).

• Bullet lists for every sticky-note or text card.

• Embedded screenshots and photos – automatically resized, placed under the right heading and zipped into an assets/ folder.

• One-click download; whole page or just the frames you select.


How it works

1 Structure top-down

Place headings above their content; the heading’s width defines the column below it.

2 Stamp to mark hierarchy

3 identical stars = H1, 2 stars = H2, 1 or 0 = regular content.

(Stars sitting on an image are ignored.)

3 Click “Download MD” or “Download JSON”

Text-only boards produce a single file; boards with images are delivered as a ready-to-share .zip.


Stop rebuilding journey maps slide-by-slide. Export once, drop the Markdown into Notion, Confluence or GitHub – or feed the JSON into your own reporting pipeline.
plugins.tagline: From FigJam to finished journey-map reports in one click – stamp, export, done.

A powerful Figma plugin that lets you convert and export any layer or frame into WebP, AVIF, PNG, or JPG formats. Export multiple sizes in one click – perfect for responsive web and mobile development.


Whether you're optimizing assets for performance or delivering production-ready visuals, this tool simplifies your export workflow.


✅ Convert to next-gen formats (WebP, AVIF)

plugins.name: Import/Export and manager variables - Lazy Variables
plugins.description:
Lazy variables is plugin that allows you to import/export multiple collections in variables and connect with remote collections from the team library. It enables seamless integration with shared design tokens, ensuring consistency across projects and teams.


Additionally, the tool helps you quickly search for variables, modify any value, and manage each variable individually. By streamlining the process of updating and maintaining design tokens, codeSyntax, it enhances collaboration, improves workflow efficiency, and optimizes your design process.
plugins.tagline: Import/Export variable collections, connecting to team libraries, and managing variables easily.

plugins.name: Class Action
plugins.description:
Class Action is a powerful CSS-like styling tool that revolutionizes how designers work with consistent design tokens and variables in Figma. Create Tailwind-inspired class libraries, UI kits, and design templates with ease, then apply saved styles instantly to other frames with a single click.


Key features:

  1. Create and manage reusable style classes similar to CSS and Tailwind classes
  2. Build and apply complete UI kits and design templates across multiple frames
  3. Preserve Figma variables, color tokens, and style references in your templates
  4. Full support for Tailwind-like utility classes, component styles, and design tokens
  5. Premium version with unlimited style classes and advanced template management


Class Action brings CSS and Tailwind-inspired workflows to Figma by eliminating repetitive styling tasks. Perfect for design systems, UI kit creation, template libraries, and maintaining visual consistency across projects. Save time, reduce styling errors, and keep your designs perfectly aligned with your component library or Tailwind-like system.


Compatible with both light and dark Figma themes, supports variable tokens for responsive templates, and optimized for performance even in large UI kit files with complex component libraries.
plugins.tagline: Think as a designer, act like a developer.

136903.name: Class Action
136903.description:
Class Action is a powerful CSS-like styling tool that revolutionizes how designers work with consistent design tokens and variables in Figma. Create Tailwind-inspired class libraries, UI kits, and design templates with ease, then apply saved styles instantly to other frames with a single click.


Key features:

  1. Create and manage reusable style classes similar to CSS and Tailwind classes
  2. Build and apply complete UI kits and design templates across multiple frames
  3. Preserve Figma variables, color tokens, and style references in your templates
  4. Full support for Tailwind-like utility classes, component styles, and design tokens
  5. Premium version with unlimited style classes and advanced template management


Class Action brings CSS and Tailwind-inspired workflows to Figma by eliminating repetitive styling tasks. Perfect for design systems, UI kit creation, template libraries, and maintaining visual consistency across projects. Save time, reduce styling errors, and keep your designs perfectly aligned with your component library or Tailwind-like system.


Compatible with both light and dark Figma themes, supports variable tokens for responsive templates, and optimized for performance even in large UI kit files with complex component libraries.

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin needs to communicate with the Lemon Squeezy API for license validation and activation.

136903.release_notes:
This update introduces powerful new control features and interface improvements that provide more precise management over how styles are applied to your Figma elements. The plugin now offers granular property selection and enhanced user experience consistency throughout the interface.

New in this release:
• Selective Property Application System: Choose exactly which properties to apply from saved classes with granular category control (Dimensions, Layout, Appearance, Fills, Strokes, Effects, Variables, Grids, Position)
• Persistent Property Preferences: Class-specific scope settings are remembered and indicated with visual markers for streamlined workflows
• Enhanced CSS Property Display: ClassDetails modal now shows only valid CSS properties, filtering out Figma-specific attributes for cleaner code reference
• Standardized Interface Components: Unified text styling across all modal dialogs for improved visual consistency
• Updated Promotional Pricing: Summer special offer with 50% discount (€4.50/year instead of €9/year) using code Y0NTY0NA
• Improved Import/Export Compatibility: Enhanced data format support ensures seamless class sharing across different plugin versions

These enhancements provide more control over style application while maintaining the plugin's focus on efficiency and precision. The selective application system addresses user requests for more granular control without compromising the streamlined workflow that makes Class Action effective for rapid Figma design iterations.
136903.tagline: Think as a designer, act like a developer.

plugins.name: PixelTweak
plugins.description:
PixelTweak is a simple yet powerful tool that helps you achieve pixel-perfect design. It smooths edges, rounds numbers, and aligns elements with just one click.


  1. Select your layers – Choose the layer or layers you want to perfect
  2. Hit the Tweak button – One click is all it takes to activate the magic!
  3. Watch the transformation – PixelTweak goes to work, smoothing out edges, rounding numbers, and aligning everything for a sleek, professional finish. It doesn’t just stop at the selected layers—it fine-tunes every child element for complete perfection.
plugins.tagline: Achieve pixel-perfect precision with a single click

122972.name: PixelTweak
122972.description:
PixelTweak is a simple yet powerful tool that helps you achieve pixel-perfect design. It smooths edges, rounds numbers, and aligns elements with just one click.


  1. Select your layers – Choose the layer or layers you want to perfect
  2. Hit the Tweak button – One click is all it takes to activate the magic!
  3. Watch the transformation – PixelTweak goes to work, smoothing out edges, rounding numbers, and aligning everything for a sleek, professional finish. It doesn’t just stop at the selected layers—it fine-tunes every child element for complete perfection.
122972.tagline: Achieve pixel-perfect precision with a single click

plugins.name: Selemander Curreny
plugins.description:
You can convert the selected numbers into currency units by country.

You can search for the currency you want to convert by searching by country name or currency code, or you can extract only numbers.

Only currency symbols and codes can be added separately,

You can also convert the Korean number to a Korean number unit or convert the Korean number back to an Arabic number.

You can enter only by collecting currency symbols.


선택된 숫자들을 국가별 통화 단위로 변환할 수 있습니다.

국가명이나 통화 코드 등으로 검색하여 변환하고 싶은 통화를 검색할 수 있으며, 숫자만 추출할 수도 있습니다.

통화 심볼, 코드만 따로 추가 할 수 있으며,

한국 숫자 단위로 변환하거나 한국 숫자를 아라비아 숫자로 다시 변환 할 수도 있습니다.

통화 심볼만 모아 보면서 입력할 수 있습니다.
plugins.tagline: Converting numbers into currency units by country and adding currency symbols, codes, etc.

plugins.name: Geometric Tile Pattern SVG Generator
plugins.description:
Geometric Pattern Generator is a Figma plugin for creating beautiful, customizable geometric patterns. Built for designers who need professional-quality patterns fast, this plugin provides generation with granular control.


Key Features:


  1. Smart Generation: Instantly create unique patterns with randomized settings or manually adjust rows, columns, block size, colors, and big blocks chances
  2. Multiple Export Options: Download as PNG or SVG, or insert patterns directly into your Figma canvas as vector or raster graphics
  3. Developer-Friendly: View and copy HTML & CSS code, raw SVG markup, or URL-encoded versions for seamless web integration
  4. Smooth Workflow: Intuitive interface with real-time preview, smooth animations, and one-click generation


Perfect for creating backgrounds, textures, brand elements, or decorative graphics. Generate backgrounds for apps, websites, presentations, or print materials, get professional geometric patterns that would take hours to create manually – in just seconds.

From concept to code, this plugin bridges the gap between design and development, making it essential for modern design workflows.

accepted.description:
I'm a Product Designer & Front-end developer creating Figma Plugins to enhance your creative workflows

https://shop.plusuidesign.com/

plugins.tagline: Create stunning geometric patterns instantly. Export PNG/SVG or insert directly into Figma designs.

インストールガイド＆プレイグラウンド試用プラグイン

plugins.name: Lock All Ratios
plugins.description:
### Features


Base on the new official figma feature Aspect Ratio Locked


- 🖼️ **Batch Operations**: Lock/unlock aspect ratios of multiple images with one click

- 🔍 **Smart Filtering**:

- Filter by ratio: Quickly find images with the same aspect ratio

- Filter by lock state: Easily distinguish between locked and unlocked images

- 👀 **Preview Features**:

- Thumbnail previews

- Display image dimensions and ratios

- Click to locate images on canvas

- 🌐 **Bilingual**: Supports both English and Chinese interfaces


### Use Cases

- When maintaining consistent image ratios

- Processing large numbers of image resources

- Organizing and checking image ratios

- Quickly locating images with specific ratios


### How to Use

1. Select images to process

2. Use top filters to filter images as needed

3. Operate individually or in batch

4. Click image thumbnails or names to locate them on canvas


### Quick Operations

- Select/Deselect All: Use the checkbox in the table header

- Quick Filter: Use the ratio and lock state filters at the top

- Batch Operations: Use "Lock All"/"Unlock All" buttons in the bottom toolbar

- Refresh List: Use the refresh button in the bottom toolbar


---


基于 figma 新发布的 “图片比例锁定” 功能开发


### 功能特点

- 🖼️ **批量操作**：一键锁定/解锁多个图片的宽高比

- 🔍 **智能筛选**：

- 按比例筛选：快速找到相同比例的图片

- 按锁定状态筛选：轻松区分已锁定和未锁定的图片

- 👀 **预览功能**：

- 缩略图预览

- 显示图片尺寸和比例

- 点击可快速定位到画布中的图片

- 🌐 **双语支持**：支持中文和英文界面


### 使用场景

- 需要保持多个图片比例一致时

- 批量处理大量图片资源时

- 整理和检查图片比例时

- 快速定位特定比例的图片


### 使用方法

1. 选择要处理的图片

2. 使用顶部筛选器按需过滤图片

3. 可以单个操作，也可以批量选择后操作

4. 点击图片缩略图或名称可快速定位到画布中的图片


### 快捷操作

- 全选/取消全选：使用表格顶部的复选框

- 快速筛选：使用顶部的比例和锁定状态筛选器

- 批量操作：使用底部工具栏的 " 锁定全部 "/" 解锁全部 " 按钮

- 刷新列表：使用底部工具栏的刷新按钮

accepted.name: RyanHuang 👀
accepted.description:
🔸 Product Designer
🔸 Heavy user of Figma
🔸 Beginner in FE

plugins.tagline: Lock/unlock aspect ratios of multiple images with Offical Lock Aspect Ratio feature

plugins.name: Text to file
plugins.description: The Text to File Plugin allows you to easily convert your text into various file formats. Whether you need a simple .txt file or a more advanced .pdf, this plugin gives you the flexibility to save your content quickly and efficiently. With just a few clicks, turn your written ideas into downloadable files for seamless sharing and storage.

plugins.name: Grid Counter
plugins.description: Grid Counter calculates how many grid columns or rows a selected element spans within its parent frame. To use, simply select an element inside a frame with a layout grid, and the plugin will display the number of columns or rows it spans. It updates in real-time as you select different elements. You can also adjust the grid columns with a click of a button.

accepted.name: Jean Candelier
accepted.description: Front End Web Developer. Former Figma employee.

plugins.tagline: Instantly measure grid spans for any selected element.

111423.name: Grid Counter
111423.description: Grid Counter calculates how many grid columns or rows a selected element spans within its parent frame. To use, simply select an element inside a frame with a layout grid, and the plugin will display the number of columns or rows it spans. It updates in real-time as you select different elements. You can also adjust the grid columns with a click of a button.
111423.release_notes: Fixes bug with elements inside of components with a grid.
111423.tagline: Instantly measure grid spans for any selected element.

plugins.name: Silent Sweep
plugins.description:
Silent Sweep is your go-to Figma plugin for effortlessly managing concealed elements in your designs. This powerful tool scans your current page, revealing all hidden layers within each frame and artboard.

With its intuitive card-based interface, you can quickly identify and select hidden elements, streamlining your cleanup process.


Key Features:


  1. Instant Detection: Automatically finds all hidden layers on your current page.
  2. Organized View: Displays hidden layers grouped by their parent frames for easy navigation.
  3. Selective Cleanup: Choose which hidden layers to remove with simple checkboxes.
  4. Real-time Updates: Refreshes automatically when you switch pages or make changes.
  5. Efficient Workflow: Helps maintain clean, organized Figma files without tedious manual searching.


Whether you're polishing up a final design or inheriting a complex file, Silent Sweep helps you maintain a tidy workspace. Say goodbye to forgotten hidden layers and hello to cleaner, more manageable Figma projects. Simplify your design process and boost your productivity with Silent Sweep – your personal cleanup assistant in Figma
plugins.tagline: Unveil and Tidy: Your Hidden Layer Ally

104803.name: Silent Sweep
104803.description:

With its intuitive card-based interface, you can quickly identify and select hidden elements, streamlining your cleanup process.


Key Features:


  1. Instant Detection: Automatically finds all hidden layers on your current page.
  2. Organized View: Displays hidden layers grouped by their parent frames for easy navigation.
  3. Selective Cleanup: Choose which hidden layers to remove with simple checkboxes.
  4. Real-time Updates: Refreshes automatically when you switch pages or make changes.
  5. Efficient Workflow: Helps maintain clean, organized Figma files without tedious manual searching.


Whether you're polishing up a final design or inheriting a complex file, Silent Sweep helps you maintain a tidy workspace. Say goodbye to forgotten hidden layers and hello to cleaner, more manageable Figma projects. Simplify your design process and boost your productivity with Silent Sweep – your personal cleanup assistant in Figma
104803.tagline: Unveil and Tidy: Your Hidden Layer Ally

plugins.name: Instance Find - Pro
plugins.description:
Keeping your design system up-to-date is now easier than ever! With Instance Find-Pro, you can effortlessly search across all the pages impacted by your components and make any necessary changes.


It also generates a handy CSV file that you can share with developers to streamline tracking. 📊


🙏 I’d love for you to try it out and share your feedback! As this is my first plugin, I’m always looking to improve and grow, and your input would mean the world to me. There’s always room to get better! ✨
plugins.tagline: Find, navigate through, and download a CSV file listing all instances of a component within a file.
